data.name: CLIPS_coef_init
data.value:
(deftemplate ioproxy (slot fact-id) (multislot answers) (multislot messages) (slot reaction) (slot value) (slot restore) )
(deffacts proxy-fact (ioproxy (fact-id 0112) (value none) (messages) ) )
(defrule clear-messages (declare (salience 90)) ?clear-msg-flg <- (clearmessage) ?proxy <- (ioproxy) => (modify ?proxy (messages)) (retract ?clear-msg-flg) )
(defrule set-output-and-halt (declare (salience 99)) ?current-message <- (sendmessagehalt ?new-msg) ?proxy <- (ioproxy (messages $?msg-list)) => (modify ?proxy (messages ?new-msg)) (retract ?current-message) (halt) )
(defrule append-output-and-halt (declare (salience 99)) ?current-message <- (appendmessagehalt $?new-msg) ?proxy <- (ioproxy (messages $?msg-list)) => (modify ?proxy (messages $?msg-list $?new-msg)) (retract ?current-message) (halt) )
(defrule set-output-and-proceed (declare (salience 99)) ?current-message <- (sendmessage ?new-msg) ?proxy <- (ioproxy) => (modify ?proxy (messages ?new-msg)) (retract ?current-message) )
(defrule append-output-and-proceed (declare (salience 99)) ?current-message <- (appendmessage ?new-msg) ?proxy <- (ioproxy (messages $?msg-list)) => (modify ?proxy (messages $?msg-list ?new-msg)) (retract ?current-message) )
(deftemplate film (slot data) (slot weight) )
(defrule merge_films (declare (salience 98)) ?n1<-(film (data ?name1) (weight ?w1)) ?n2<-(film (data ?name2) (weight ?w2)) (test (= 0 (str-compare ?name1 ?name2))) (test (<> ?w1 ?w2)) => (modify ?n1 (weight (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5))) (retract ?n2) (assert (appendmessagehalt (str-cat ?name1" (" ?w1 ", " ?w2 ") => " (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5)))) )
(deftemplate time_space (slot data) (slot weight) )
(defrule merge_time_space (declare (salience 98)) ?n1<-(time_space (data ?name1) (weight ?w1)) ?n2<-(time_space (data ?name2) (weight ?w2)) (test (= 0 (str-compare ?name1 ?name2))) (test (<> ?w1 ?w2)) => (modify ?n1 (weight (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5))) (retract ?n2) (assert (appendmessagehalt (str-cat ?name1" (" ?w1 ", " ?w2 ") => " (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5)))) )
(deftemplate director (slot data) (slot weight) )
(defrule merge_directors (declare (salience 98)) ?n1<-(director (data ?name1) (weight ?w1)) ?n2<-(director (data ?name2) (weight ?w2)) (test (= 0 (str-compare ?name1 ?name2))) (test (<> ?w1 ?w2)) => (modify ?n1 (weight (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5))) (retract ?n2) (assert (appendmessagehalt (str-cat ?name1" (" ?w1 ", " ?w2 ") => " (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5)))) )
(deftemplate genre (slot data) (slot weight) )
(defrule merge_directors (declare (salience 98)) ?n1<-(genre (data ?name1) (weight ?w1)) ?n2<-(genre (data ?name2) (weight ?w2)) (test (= 0 (str-compare ?name1 ?name2))) (test (<> ?w1 ?w2)) => (modify ?n1 (weight (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5))) (retract ?n2) (assert (appendmessagehalt (str-cat ?name1" (" ?w1 ", " ?w2 ") => " (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5)))) )
(deftemplate rating (slot data) (slot weight) )
(defrule merge_rating (declare (salience 98)) ?n1<-(rating (data ?name1) (weight ?w1)) ?n2<-(rating (data ?name2) (weight ?w2)) (test (= 0 (str-compare ?name1 ?name2))) (test (<> ?w1 ?w2)) => (modify ?n1 (weight (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5))) (retract ?n2) (assert (appendmessagehalt (str-cat ?name1" (" ?w1 ", " ?w2 ") => " (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5)))) )
(deftemplate gender (slot data) (slot weight) )
(defrule merge_gender (declare (salience 98)) ?n1<-(gender (data ?name1) (weight ?w1)) ?n2<-(gender (data ?name2) (weight ?w2)) (test (= 0 (str-compare ?name1 ?name2))) (test (<> ?w1 ?w2)) => (modify ?n1 (weight (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5))) (retract ?n2) (assert (appendmessagehalt (str-cat ?name1" (" ?w1 ", " ?w2 ") => " (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5)))) )
(deftemplate oscar (slot data) (slot weight) )
(defrule merge_oscar (declare (salience 98)) ?n1<-(oscar (data ?name1) (weight ?w1)) ?n2<-(oscar (data ?name2) (weight ?w2)) (test (= 0 (str-compare ?name1 ?name2))) (test (<> ?w1 ?w2)) => (modify ?n1 (weight (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5))) (retract ?n2) (assert (appendmessagehalt (str-cat ?name1" (" ?w1 ", " ?w2 ") => " (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5)))) )
(deftemplate age (slot data) (slot weight) )
(defrule merge_age (declare (salience 98)) ?n1<-(age (data ?name1) (weight ?w1)) ?n2<-(age (data ?name2) (weight ?w2)) (test (= 0 (str-compare ?name1 ?name2))) (test (<> ?w1 ?w2)) => (modify ?n1 (weight (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5))) (retract ?n2) (assert (appendmessagehalt (str-cat ?name1" (" ?w1 ", " ?w2 ") => " (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5)))) )
(deftemplate mood (slot data) (slot weight) )
(defrule merge_mood (declare (salience 98)) ?n1<-(mood (data ?name1) (weight ?w1)) ?n2<-(mood (data ?name2) (weight ?w2)) (test (= 0 (str-compare ?name1 ?name2))) (test (<> ?w1 ?w2)) => (modify ?n1 (weight (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5))) (retract ?n2) (assert (appendmessagehalt (str-cat ?name1" (" ?w1 ", " ?w2 ") => " (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5)))) )
(deftemplate composer (slot data) (slot weight) )
(defrule merge_composer (declare (salience 98)) ?n1<-(composer (data ?name1) (weight ?w1)) ?n2<-(composer (data ?name2) (weight ?w2)) (test (= 0 (str-compare ?name1 ?name2))) (test (<> ?w1 ?w2)) => (modify ?n1 (weight (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5))) (retract ?n2) (assert (appendmessagehalt (str-cat ?name1" (" ?w1 ", " ?w2 ") => " (* (+ ?w1 ?w2) 0.5)))) )

data.name: CLIPS_init
data.value:
(deftemplate ioproxy (slot fact-id) (multislot answers) (multislot messages) (slot reaction) (slot value) (slot restore) )
(deffacts proxy-fact (ioproxy (fact-id 0112) (value none) (messages) ) )
(defrule clear-messages (declare (salience 90)) ?clear-msg-flg <- (clearmessage) ?proxy <- (ioproxy) => (modify ?proxy (messages)) (retract ?clear-msg-flg) )
(defrule set-output-and-halt (declare (salience 99)) ?current-message <- (sendmessagehalt ?new-msg) ?proxy <- (ioproxy (messages $?msg-list)) => (modify ?proxy (messages ?new-msg)) (retract ?current-message) (halt) )
(defrule append-output-and-halt (declare (salience 99)) ?current-message <- (appendmessagehalt $?new-msg) ?proxy <- (ioproxy (messages $?msg-list)) => (modify ?proxy (messages $?msg-list $?new-msg)) (retract ?current-message) (halt) )
(defrule set-output-and-proceed (declare (salience 99)) ?current-message <- (sendmessage ?new-msg) ?proxy <- (ioproxy) => (modify ?proxy (messages ?new-msg)) (retract ?current-message) )
(defrule append-output-and-proceed (declare (salience 99)) ?current-message <- (appendmessage ?new-msg) ?proxy <- (ioproxy (messages $?msg-list)) => (modify ?proxy (messages $?msg-list ?new-msg)) (retract ?current-message) )
(deftemplate film (slot data) )
(deftemplate time_space (slot data) )
(deftemplate director (slot data) )
(deftemplate genre (slot data) )
(deftemplate rating (slot data) )
(deftemplate gender (slot data) )
(deftemplate oscar (slot data) )
(deftemplate oscar (slot data) )
(deftemplate age (slot data) )
(deftemplate mood (slot data) )
(deftemplate composer (slot data) )
